content:
I was playing with some fancy features, and wanted to do:

struct Foo<const N = 1024: usize> {
    buf: [u8; N],
}

I don't know if there are any plans to have defaults like that.
i dont think its in the MVP but its certainly a reasonable feature

I've been working on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75384, but I've been a bit slow since there's stuff outside of Rust I've been working on. I've added a separate feature gate for it in the PR since I haven't checked whether it should be added to const_generics or not, but I can put it into const_generics/min_const_generics.
